author: Johnny Lieu
title: The cast of 'Moonlight' front new Calvin Klein underwear campaign
text:
There's no stopping the cast of Moonlight .
Fresh from the utter sh*tstorm that was the Oscars, Academy Award-winning Mahershala Ali and his fellow co-stars Alex Hibbert, Ashton Sanders, and Trevante Rhodes are fronting a captivating underwear campaign for Calvin Klein.
SEE ALSO: How 'Moonlight' made Oscars history
Shot by Willy Vanderperre, the campaign is a series of black and white photographs which are a mix of fashion shots and close-up portraits of the actors.
A post shared by Calvin Klein (@calvinklein) on Feb 27, 2017 at 8:09am PST
A post shared by Calvin Klein (@calvinklein) on Feb 27, 2017 at 9:06am PST
A post shared by Calvin Klein (@calvinklein) on Feb 27, 2017 at 4:00am PST
Just another perk of being in such a stunning and widely-lauded film, we guess. Some of the cast even donned Calvin Klein suits to the Oscars .
"It's an acknowledgement of remarkable actors who are revealing something important of being a man today in what they do," Raf Simons, Chief Creative Officer of Calvin Klein, said in a statement as per Fashionista .
The images will appear on billboards, alongside digital and print media.
A post shared by Calvin Klein (@calvinklein) on Feb 27, 2017 at 3:05pm PST
A post shared by willyvanderperre (@willyvanderperre) on Feb 27, 2017 at 9:48am PST
"Since the beginning, Calvin Klein's underwear imagery has always made big statements about masculinity; the performances of these actors in Moonlight affected us deeply and made big statements about masculinity in a different way. Somehow we wanted to bring the two together," Pieter Mulier, Calvin Klein's creative director, said in a statement.
Moonlight took home three Oscars on Sunday, including a Best Supporting Actor win for Ali, Best Writing Adapted Screenplay, and of course, Best Picture.
BONUS: Now we know: The Best Picture Oscar debacle was the accountants' fault
